name: Peach Mango Jello Custard
description:
This was born from the strawberry jello custard I posted. I'm doing the jam monster thing and releasing this with the strawberry jello, let's call it the jello monster, if you will. I was playing around with the custard layer and found that quite a few fruits worked with this layer.  

FA Custard = FA Custard Premium

The Custard:
I wanted more if a dairy custard and TFA Vanilla Swirl was perfect to bring in a milk like quality into the mix with the vanilla notes that I needed. FA Custard Premium is perfect for the buttery quality of custard and INW Custard adds the richness and egginess that I needed.

The Peach Mango Jello: 
JF honey peach is the king of peaches and works perfectly with FLV the king of mangos to create a really great candied peach and mango. Swedish fish is used low to help create a jello sensation and doesn't add too much to the taste of Swedish fish.

Super sweet is optional. What can I say, it tastes commercial now.
author: TheDrStore
